messages.text:
.hgignore?

at least we need to ignore:
last-change

but perhaps
*.orig
*.rej
as well.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

We shouldn't be reviewing this. The 'go.empty' subrepo is supposed to
be the starting repo. If it's wrong, let's fix it. If it's not wrong,
please just

hg pull go.empty
hg push go.talks

LGTM.

On Fri, Aug 31, 2012 at 12:29 PM,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go.talks
>
>
> Description:
> go.talks: initialize new repository
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/6496062/
>
> Affected files:
>   A codereview.cfg
>
>
> Index: codereview.cfg
> ===================================================================
> new file mode 100644
> --- /dev/null
> +++ b/codereview.cfg
> @@ -0,0 +1,2 @@
> +defaultcc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com
> +contributors: http://go.googlecode.com/hg/CONTRIBUTORS
>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dave@cheney.net, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7490fde3ca2b&repo=talks ***

go.talks: initialize new repository

R=golang-dev, dave, r, minux.ma, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6496062

On 1 September 2012 03:48, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> We shouldn't be reviewing this. The 'go.empty' subrepo is supposed to
> be the starting repo. If it's wrong, let's fix it. If it's not wrong,

It's not wrong. I just forgot about it. I diff'd the contents of
go.empty and the files in this CL and only the README was (correctly)
different. Submitting.

subject: code review 6496062: go.talks: initialize new repository
